comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Attached a patch with a simple TestRepository implementation and the associated test-repository.xml configuration file.

PS. Like the TransientRepository class and many other, this doesn't really fit the definition of a "core" class, but I'm placing it there since at the moment there doesn't seem to be a better place and starting a new package for just one class seems quite wasteful.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Hoping to get this included in 1.0-rc3.
